name: Anti-Virus:Magath
description:
This is my entry for the mini jam 47 which theme is "INTERNET" and the limitation which was "Must die in one hit". Anti-virus: Magath is a 2D action adventure game where you as the anti-virus of the owner must clean some drivers for the sake of the computer to not be infected.

Goal of the game:

Destroy the 5 cubes that are infected by pressing the E key when you are close by (tho at the moment there is no a winning or losing).
